snippet.title: Treasure Stack Nintendo Switch Reveal
snippet.description: Treasure Stack fuses falling block puzzle mechanics with platformer elements to create a gameplay experience unlike anything you've played before. Use your platforming skills to navigate the play field, snatch falling blocks with the grappling hook, and stack them to create matches! Test your skills in Challenge mode, compete with friends in Local Versus mode, or jump into Online Versus and battle head to head! Coming to Nintendo Switch in December 2018!
